textList.text: A Mantis fighter engages you in an asteroid field, their pilot skillfully dodging all obstacles. Time to test your own ship and crew.
The asteroid fields attract the most reckless of Mantis, who depend on luck for hunting and usually don't survive for long. One of these hunters attacks you.
While the asteroids could be devastating for Mantis ships, this particular fighter doesn't seem to care and attacks anyway.
Who knows why the Mantis would venture so close to a sun. Perhaps it makes for more of a challenge?
Everyone knows that the Mantis aren't particularly good at dealing with fires. Except the ship that attacks you dangerously close to a supergiant.
This Mantis ship is either very bold or very stupid: they attack you near a sun, being exposed to its heat as much as you do.
